text: The air was fresh and clear and you could see far over west and north for many miles. The real high country of the Rockies lifted up in the distance like a pale water-colour drawing. Between us and that lay a vast stretch of hills, canyons, buttes and malpais.
handwritten_text: The air was fresh and clear and you could see far over west and north for many miles. The real high country of the Rockies lifted up in the distance like a pale water-colour drawing. Between us and that lay a vast stretch of hills, canyons, buttes and malpais.
